item.title: Esercizi 6, 7 ed 8 pagina 76
item.description: Esercizi di Inglese # Pagina numero 76. Language for life B1. Esercizi 6,7 e 8. Esercizio 6 # Make Do A choice A difference Friends Good Charity work Esercizio 7 # Make Do A decision A survey A survey A suggestion Your best Business Money A mistake A favour The right thing Esercizio 8 # make a decision made a mistake Doing your best Do me a favour make a suggestion / make money Andrea Bortolotti
